\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
Publicar. 

Finestra de publicar, la qual permetrà a l\textquotesingle{}usuari realitzar publicacions. 

Definition at line \mbox{\hyperlink{_publicar_8g_8cs_source_l00042}{42}} of file \mbox{\hyperlink{_publicar_8g_8cs_source}{Publicar.\+g.\+cs}}.
